thread.title: Naudia Toatley
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Naudia Toatley

author: Naudia Toatley
title: Naudia Toatley
text: I bought a bed under missleading information from a sales associate and now have to be inconvenienced because I had to return the bed and wait for a refund which I was told I would get a FULL refund and am being took in circles because it was not noted in my file for me to get a full refund. I am very displeased with gardner White as a whole.
